comment: Im suspicious of this whole Saudi Arabia narrative. While Im sure the Saudis arent saints, I doubt theyre stupid to use hit squads that can be easily tied to them. Im thinking regime change is in the works.
amr:
# ::snt Im suspicious of this whole Saudi Arabia narrative. While Im sure the Saudis arent saints, I doubt theyre stupid to use hit squads that can be easily tied to them. Im thinking regime change is in the works.
(m / multi-sentence
      :snt1 (s / suspicious-02
            :ARG0 (ii / i)
            :ARG1 (n / narrate-01
                  :ARG1 (c / country
                        :name (n2 / name
                              :op1 "Saudi"
                              :op2 "Arabia"))
                  :mod (w / whole)))
      :snt2 (d / doubt-01
            :ARG0 (ii2 / i)
            :ARG1 (s2 / stupid
                  :domain (p / person
                        :mod (c2 / country
                              :name n2
                              :op1 "Saudi"
                              :op2 "Arabia")))
            :concession (s3 / sure-02
                  :ARG0 ii2
                  :ARG1 (s4 / saint
                        :polarity -
                        :domain p))
            :condition (u / use-01
                  :ARG0 p
                  :ARG1 (s5 / squad
                        :ARG0-of (h / hit-01)
                        :ARG1-of (t / tie-01
                              :ARG1-of (e / easy-05)
                              :ARG1-of (p2 / possible-01)))))
      :snt3 (t2 / think-01
            :ARG0 (ii3 / i)
            :ARG1 (w2 / work-09
                  :ARG1 (c3 / change-01
                        :ARG1 (r / regime)))))

comment: People from the Middle East are just as human as you or I and deserve to be spoken of with basic decency.

                  :ARG1 p
                  :ARG3 (e / equal)
